properties.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 2 at 5:10PM CST until January 3 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Mobile AL
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, dense fog will reduce
visibility to one mile or less. For the Small Craft Advisory,
south winds 20 to 25 kt with higher gusts and waves 2 to 3 feet.

* WHERE...Southern Mobile Bay and Mississippi Sound.

* WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 10 AM CST Friday. For
the Small Craft Advisory, until 6 AM CST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft. Low
visibility will make navigation difficult.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

If you must navigate, proceed with caution. Use proper fog
signals. Make sure all running lights are on. Remember to use
your radar and compass.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST FRIDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST FRIDAY
